item.description:
收益率达到 1999 年以来的最高水平，并在高市领导下加速增长。【原文：

Yields are their highest since 1999 and accelerating under Takaichi.

item.title: 炼油厂关闭后，瓦莱罗公司将增加加州的燃油进口量
item.description: 瓦莱罗能源公司（Valero Energy Corp. ）预计将增加旧金山湾区的汽油进口量，该公司正在推进关闭该地区一家炼油厂的计划，但暂时不会完全退出北加州。【原文：Valero Energy Corp. is expecting to increase gasoline imports to the San Francisco Bay Area, as the company moves forward with plans to close a refinery in the region but stops short of fully exiting Northern California for now.】

item.title: 泰国央行强调政策必须从中期角度出发
item.description: 已将利率降至2022年以来最低点的泰国央行周三表示，它对货币政策持中期观点，以防范金融体系面临的意外风险，并为进一步放宽政策保留有限的空间。【原文：The Bank of Thailand, which has slashed interest rate to the lowest since 2022, said Wednesday that it takes a medium-term view of monetary policy to safeguard against unforeseen risks to the financial system and preserve its limited space for further easing.】

item.title: 百度人工智能芯片部门昆仑万维据说将为 20 亿美元的香港 IPO 挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，百度公司的人工智能芯片部门已聘请银行在香港进行首次公开募股，募集资金可能高达 20 亿美元。【原文：Baidu Inc.’s artificial-intelligence chip unit has hired banks for an initial public offering in Hong Kong that may raise as much as $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中日新出口限制令亚洲稀土库存攀升
item.description: 中国禁止向日本出口军用品，此举有可能挤压供应链，随后整个亚太地区与稀土相关的股票都上涨了。【原文：Rare earth-related shares gained across the Asia-Pacific region after China imposed a ban on exports of military-use items to Japan, a move with the potential to squeeze supply chains.】

item.title: 受中国人民银行展望和补货影响，铁矿石创 2 月份以来新高
item.description: 受中国宏观经济支持前景和节前补货的提振，铁矿石连续第四天上涨。【原文：Iron ore rose for a fourth day, buoyed by the outlook for macro-economic support in China and pre-holiday restocking.】

item.title: 中国股市成交量跃升预示 2026 年反弹仍将继续
item.description: 中国的股票交易量攀升至四个月来的最高水平，这表明 2026 年初的股市反弹还有进一步的空间。【原文：China’s stock trading volume climbed to the highest level in four months, suggesting the equity rally at the start of 2026 has further to run.】

item.title: 德意志银行在 2025 年印度美元债券交易中名列前茅
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）在外币债务发行放缓的情况下，取代渣打银行，自 2007 年以来首次获得为印度借款人安排美元债券的头把交椅。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG clinched the top slot arranging dollar bonds for Indian borrowers for the first time since 2007, taking over from Standard Chartered Bank as foreign currency debt issuance slowed.】

item.title: 高盛预测 2026 年中国股市将因利润增长而上涨 20
item.description: 高盛集团预计，在人工智能和政策措施的支持下，中国股票基准今年将继续增长，但增速将低于去年。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. projects Chinese stock benchmarks to post another year of growth, though at a slower pace than last year, with earnings supported by AI and policy measures.】

item.title: 新西兰法院采取行动阻止黑客攻击医疗记录的传播
item.description: 在黑客访问了新西兰三分之一以上人口使用的医疗门户网站上保存的约 43 万份病人私人文件后，新西兰高等法院发布了一项紧急禁令，禁止公布被盗医疗数据。【原文：The New Zealand High Court has issued an urgent injunction barring the publication of stolen medical data after hackers accessed about 430,000 private patient documents held on a health portal used by more than a third of the country’s population.】

item.title: 台积电股价创历史新高引发华尔街争相上调目标价
item.description: 研究分析师争相上调台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Research analysts are scrambling to raise price targets on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. shares, underscoring continued bullishness on the chipmaking giant after its record surge.】

item.title: 镍从 19 个月高点回落，金属涨势暂缓
item.description: 镍从 19 个月来的最高水平回落，因为提振基本金属的强劲反弹势头得到了喘息。【原文：Nickel retreated from the highest level in 19 months, as a strong rally that’s lifted base metals took a breather.】

item.title: 啤酒企业的首次公开募股一度成为禁忌，但现在又回到了泰国证券交易所的议程上
item.description: 泰国证券交易所主席表示，泰国证券交易所可能会为酒类饮料上市敞开大门，因为酒类饮料在这个以佛教为主的国家长期以来一直是一个禁忌话题，泰国证券交易所希望借此启动陷入困境的股票市场的股票销售。【原文：Thailand’s stock exchange may open the door to alcohol beverage listings, long a taboo topic in the predominantly Buddhist country, as it seeks to jump-start share sales in its embattled equity market, according to its chairman.】

item.title: 中国嘀嗒同行瓜子网考虑首次离岸债券销售
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，瓜子二手车正在考虑首次离岸债券销售，加入中国科技公司进军全球债务市场的浪潮。【原文：Kuaishou Technology is considering a maiden offshore bond sale, according to people familiar with the matter, joining a wave of Chinese technology companies tapping global debt markets.】

item.title: 三星警告称内存成本上升将导致价格上涨
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.）预计，内存芯片供应短缺将提高整个电子行业的价格，包括可能提高其消费产品的价格。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. expects memory chip supply shortages to raise prices across the electronics industry, including potentially among its own consumer products.】

item.title: 菲律宾比索跌至历史新低，央行称二月降息在望
item.description: 在菲律宾央行发出降息信号后，菲律宾比索跌至历史新低，交易商也在评估央行对弱势货币的容忍度。【原文：The Philippine peso declined to a new record low after the central bank signaled an interest-rate cut and as traders assessed its tolerance for a weaker currency.】

item.title: 摩托罗拉发布首款书本式可折叠可穿戴人工智能概念机
item.description: 联想集团旗下的摩托罗拉推出了首款折叠式手机，其打开方式就像一本书或护照，与该品牌过去几年推出的一系列蛤壳式折叠手机不同。【原文：Lenovo Group Ltd.‘s Motorola unveiled its first folding phone that opens like a book or passport, a departure from the string of clamshell-style foldables that the brand has released over the last several years.】

item.title: 联想在 CES 发布会上首次推出 Qira 人工智能平台和概念设备
item.description: 联想集团有限公司发布了一个新的人工智能平台和几款概念验证设备，这家全球最畅销的个人电脑制造商试图以此表明自己在人工智能领域的实力。【原文：Lenovo Group Ltd. unveiled a new artificial intelligence platform and several proof-of-concept devices, an attempt by the world’s best-selling PC maker to show it can be a serious player in AI.】

item.title: 澳大利亚核心通胀放缓，促使澳大利亚央行决定按兵不动
item.description: 澳大利亚 11 月份的核心通胀率有所放缓，这支持了储备银行在评估早前宽松政策的影响时暂时维持利率不变的观点。【原文：Australia’s core inflation slowed in November, supporting the case for the Reserve Bank to keep interest rates unchanged for now as it assesses the impact of earlier policy easing.】

item.title: 日本企业债券销售将在 2026 年再创辉煌
item.description: 银行家们预计，继 2025 年创纪录的债券发行量之后，今年日本公司以日元计价的公司债券销售将再创辉煌。【原文：Bankers expect another blockbuster year for sales of yen-denominated corporate debt from Japanese companies following the record tally of bonds issued in 2025.】

item.title: 马杜罗下台，华尔街追逐委内瑞拉的财富
item.description:
多年来，这个拉丁美洲国家一直是禁区。现在，贸易商和大亨们正在抢滩登陆。【原文：

For years, the Latin American country was all but off-limits. Now, traders and tycoons are pouncing.

】

item.title: 印度出口商面临失去美国订单的风险，除非达成一月贸易协议
item.description: 由于新德里和华盛顿之间的贸易谈判迟迟没有进展，从家居装饰到皮鞋等产品的印度出口商担心，如果他们无法在一月份锁定订单，就会错过美国的夏季购物季。【原文：Indian exporters of products ranging from home decor to leather shoes are worried about missing the US summer shopping season if they are unable to lock in orders in January as trade-deal talks drag on between New Delhi and Washington.】

item.title: 特朗普称委内瑞拉将向美国输送多达 5000 万桶石油
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，委内瑞拉将向美国放弃多达 5000 万桶石油，并宣布将出售这些石油，所得收益将惠及两国。【原文：President Donald Trump said Venezuela would relinquish as much as 50 million barrels of oil to the US, declaring it would be sold with the proceeds benefiting both countries.】

item.title: 日本抗议中国新的军民两用产品出口管制措施
item.description: 中国宣布对运往日本的可能具有军事用途的物品实施出口管制，东京对此表示抗议，这是两个亚洲国家在台湾争端中外交紧张局势的最新爆发。【原文：Tokyo protested China’s announcement of export controls on items shipped to Japan that could have military uses, the latest flare up in diplomatic tension between the two Asian nations in a dispute related to Taiwan.】

item.title: 特朗普称委内瑞拉将向美国提供部分原油，石油价格下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示委内瑞拉将向美国上交多达 5000 万桶原油后，原油跌幅扩大。【原文：Oil extended losses after President Donald Trump said Venezuela would turn over as many as 50 million barrels of crude to the US, which would be sold at market prices to benefit both countries.】

item.title: 交易商摒弃地缘政治风险，关注美国数据，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 黄金在连续三日上涨后趋于稳定，因为交易商将目光从加剧的地缘政治紧张局势转向了本周将公布的美国经济数据。【原文：Gold steadied after three days of gains, as traders looked beyond heightened geopolitical tensions to US economic data due this week.】

item.title: 三星牛市押注创纪录的盈利能维持 3,500 亿美元的涨势
item.description: 自去年年初以来，三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.【原文：A stock rally that has added $350 billion in market value for Samsung Electronics Co. since the start of last year may have more room to run as bullish analysts and investors eye record profits.】

item.title: 聊天平台 Discord秘密申请 IPO
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Discord 公司以保密方式提交了首次公开募股申请，为迅速增长的风险投资支持的科技公司上市队伍再添一员。【原文：Discord Inc. filed confidentially for an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, adding to a rapidly growing pipeline of venture capital-backed tech listings.】

item.title: 投资者称，韩国股市傲视全球的反弹只是一个开始
item.description: 韩国股票在 2025 年领跑全球市场，凭借诱人的估值、技术驱动型盈利和强有力的政府支持吸引了众多投资者，因此不乏买入呼声。【原文：South Korean stocks are seeing no shortage of buy calls after leading global markets in 2025, drawing investors with attractive valuations, tech-driven earnings and strong government support.】

item.title: 中日争端将拖累亚洲股市：市场综述
item.description: 尽管对人工智能的乐观情绪和对美联储宽松政策的预期推动美股创下新高，但亚洲股市在经历了有史以来最好的开年表现后似乎将喘口气。【原文：Asian stocks look set to take a breather after their best-ever start to a year, even as optimism over artificial intelligence and expectations of Federal Reserve easing drove US shares to a new high.】
